title: Pineapple and cauliflower 'rice' salad
ingredients: ['1/2 fresh pineapple', '1 head cauliflower, broken into florets', '50g broccoli florets, or to taste', '40g cashews', '1/4 red onion, roughly chopped', '10 leaves Thai basil', '1/2 lime', 'Himalayan pink salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder, or to taste', '1/2 avocado - peeled, pitted and diced']
